whoAreWe.title: Who are we?
whoAreWe.body: Login is a student association for IT studies at NTNU Gj√∏vik. The association is run by students and the aim of our work is to improve the study environment at the university.

sponsor.title: mnemonic
sponsor.body: mnemonic is the main sponsor of Login. They are one of the leading IT security providers in Europe. Their experts are always ready to crack down on advanced cyber threats.

companiesInfo.title: For companies
companiesInfo.body: Login acts as the link between studies and working life. Check out what we can offer your company.
